greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n+1 terms, starting with n, such that the difference between successive terms is equal to n^3 - 1.
comment: Note that the last term of the n-th row is the fourth power of n, A000583(n).
See also the triangles of A162615 and A162616.
formula: Sum_{k=0..n} T(n,k) = n*(n^2-n+1)*(n+1)^2/2 (row sums). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
T(n,k) = n + k*(n^3-1). - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2009
program: print([A162614(n,k) for n in range(0,20) for k in range(0,n+1)])
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 15 2009
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2009
